file_test.comment: Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and has permissions rw------- or more restrictive
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and is owned by root:root
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml exists and has permissions rw------- or more restrictive
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-scheduler.yaml exists and has permissions rw------- or more restrictive
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-scheduler.yaml exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/etcd.yaml exists and has permissions rw------- or more restrictive
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/etcd.yaml exists and is owned by 0:0 and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /var/lib/etcd exists and has permissions rwx------ and does not have permissions ---rwxrwx
Ensure at least one file named /var/lib/etcd exists and is owned by 420:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/admin.conf exists and has permissions rw------- or more restrictive
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/admin.conf exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/scheduler.conf exists and has permissions rw------- or more restrictive
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/scheduler.conf exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure that the controller-manager.conf file permissions are set to 600 or more restrictive
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/controller-manager.conf exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/pki/ exists and is owned by 0:0

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and does not match pattern ^.*--token-auth-file=.*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--kubelet-https=true$

Ensure at least one file named /var/lib/kubelet/config.yaml exists and matches pattern rotateCertificates:.*true$

process58_test.comment: Ensure that the --token-auth-file parameter is not set
Ensure that the --kubelet-https argument is set to true
Ensure that the --kubelet-https argument is set to true or does not exist
Ensure that the --kubelet-client-certificate and --kubelet-client-key arguments are set as appropriate
Ensure that the --kubelet-client-certificate and --kubelet-client-key arguments are set as appropriate

Ensure that the --authorization-mode argument is not set to AlwaysAllow
Ensure that the --authorization-mode argument includes Node
Ensure that the --authorization-mode argument includes RBAC
Ensure that the admission control plugin EventRateLimit is set
Ensure that the admission control plugin EventRateLimit is set
Ensure that the deprecated admission control plugin AlwaysAdmit is not set
Ensure that the admission control plugin AlwaysPullImages is set
Ensure that the admission control plugin ServiceAccount is set
Ensure that the admission control plugin NamespaceLifecycle is set
Ensure that the admission control plugin PodSecurityPolicy is set
Ensure that the admission control plugin NodeRestriction is set

Ensure that the --insecure-port argument is set to 0
Ensure that the --secure-port argument is not set to 0
Ensure that the --profiling argument is set to false
Ensure that the --audit-log-path argument is set as appropriate

Ensure that the --service-account-lookup argument is set to true
Ensure that the --service-account-key-file argument is set as appropriate
Ensure that the --etcd-certfile and --etcd-keyfile arguments are set as appropriate
Ensure that the --etcd-certfile and --etcd-keyfile arguments are set as appropriate
Ensure that the --tls-cert-file and --tls-private-key-file arguments are set as appropriate
Ensure that the --tls-cert-file and --tls-private-key-file arguments are set as appropriate
Ensure that the --client-ca-file argument is set as appropriate
Ensure that the --etcd-cafile argument is set as appropriate
Ensure that the --experimental-encryption-provider-config argument is set as appropriate
Ensure that the encryption provider is set to aescbc
Ensure that the API Server only makes use of Strong Cryptographic Ciphers
Ensure that the --terminated-pod-gc-threshold argument is set as appropriate
Ensure that the --profiling argument is set to false
Ensure that the --use-service-account-credentials argument is set to true
Ensure that the --service-account-private-key-file argument is set as appropriate
Ensure that the --root-ca-file argument is set as appropriate
Ensure that the RotateKubeletServerCertificate argument is set to true
Ensure that the --address argument is set to 127.0.0.1
Ensure that the --profiling argument is set to false
Ensure that the --address argument is set to 127.0.0.1
Ensure that the --cert-file and --key-file arguments are set as appropriate
Ensure that the --cert-file and --key-file arguments are set as appropriate
Ensure that the --client-cert-auth argument is set to true
Ensure that the --auto-tls argument is not set to true
Ensure that the --peer-cert-file and --peer-key-file arguments are set as appropriate
Ensure that the --peer-cert-file and --peer-key-file arguments are set as appropriate
Ensure that the --peer-client-cert-auth argument is set to true
Ensure that the --peer-auto-tls argument is not set to true
Ensure that a unique Certificate Authority is used for etcd
Ensure that the --authorization-mode argument is not set to AlwaysAllow
Ensure that the --client-ca-file argument is set as appropriate
Ensure that the --protect-kernel-defaults argument is set to true
Ensure that the --make-iptables-util-chains argument is set to true
Ensure that the --rotate-certificates argument is set to true

shellcommand_test.comment: Ensure 'kubectl get psp -o json' output Pattern Match 'privileged..:false' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get psp -o json' output Pattern Match 'hostPID..:false' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get psp -o json' output Pattern Not Match 'hostPID' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get psp -o=json' output Pattern Match 'hostIPC..:false' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get psp -o=json' output Pattern Not Match 'hostIPC' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get psp -o=json' output Pattern Match 'hostNetwork..:false' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get psp -o=json' output Pattern Not Match 'hostNetwork' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get psp -o=json' output Pattern Match 'allowPrivilegeEscalation...false' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get psp -o=json' output Pattern Not Match 'allowPrivilegeEscalation' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get psp -o=json' output Pattern Match 'MustRunAsNonRoot' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get psp -o=json' output Pattern Match 'MustRunAs' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get psp -o=json' output Pattern Match 'requiredDropCapabilities......NET_RAW' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get psp -o=json' output Pattern Match 'requiredDropCapabilities......ALL' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get psp -o=json' output Pattern Not Match 'allowedCapabilities' (string)

Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and is owned by root:root

Ensure at least one file named /var/lib/etcd exists and is owned by 420:0

Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/scheduler.conf exists and is owned by 0:0

Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/controller-manager.conf exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/pki/ exists and is owned by 0:0
